pack_japon.title: Ancient Japan
pack_japon.descShort: Discover the best of Japan by visiting Tokyo, Kyoto, and Nara
pack_japon.descLong:
Embark on an unforgettable experience through the heart of Japan, where ancient tradition and modern life coexist in perfect harmony. This carefully designed journey will take you from the vibrant metropolis of Tokyo, with its neon lights and cutting-edge technology, to the serene temples and zen gardens of Kyoto.

Discover Japan’s contrasts: attend a tea ceremony, walk through a bamboo forest, stay in a ryokan, and taste authentic sushi at the Tsukiji market.

pack_indonesia.title: Charms of Indonesia
pack_indonesia.descShort: Explore Bali, Java, and the paradise islands of Indonesia
pack_indonesia.descLong:
Immerse yourself in the cultural and natural diversity of Indonesia, from the golden beaches of Bali to the ancient temples of Java. Enjoy vibrant local life, volcanic landscapes, and the richness of its cuisine.

Admire the rice terraces, snorkel in crystal-clear waters, and be captivated by traditional dances and the warmth of its people.

pack_tailandia.title: Tropical Thailand
pack_tailandia.descShort: Experience the magic of Bangkok, Chiang Mai, and the tropical islands
pack_tailandia.descLong:
Discover exotic Thailand, where lush nature and ancient culture come together. Visit golden temples, explore floating markets, and relax on paradise beaches.

Take part in colorful festivals, enjoy delicious street food, and explore jungles and waterfalls in the country’s northern region.

pack_india.title: Mysteries of India
pack_india.descShort: Explore Delhi, Jaipur, Agra, and the charm of the Taj Mahal
pack_india.descLong:
Dive into the most authentic and fascinating India. From the bustling streets of Delhi to the majesty of the Taj Mahal, passing through royal palaces and lively bazaars.

Live a spiritual experience, taste exotic spices, and walk through paths full of history and color that make India an unforgettable destination.

pack_corea.title: Modern Korea
pack_corea.descShort: Discover Seoul, Busan, and the mix of tradition and technology
pack_corea.descLong:
Travel to South Korea and be amazed by its unique combination of modernity and tradition. Explore futuristic skyscrapers, ancient palaces, and vibrant neighborhoods full of art and gastronomy.

Enjoy K-pop culture, the hanbok, street food, and the natural landscapes surrounding its cities.

pack_vietnam.title: Authentic Vietnam
pack_vietnam.descShort: Explore Hanoi, Ha Long Bay, and Vietnamese culture
pack_vietnam.descLong:
Experience the cultural and natural richness of Vietnam, from bustling Hanoi to the natural wonders of Ha Long Bay. Walk through traditional markets, temples, and breathtaking landscapes.

Enjoy local cuisine, bike rides through the countryside, and the hospitality of its people.

pack_china.title: Empires of China
pack_china.descShort: Explore Beijing, Xi'an, and the greatness of the Great Wall
pack_china.descLong:
Immerse yourself in China’s millennia-old history, from the capital Beijing to the ancient city of Xi'an. Visit the Great Wall, the Forbidden City, and the Terracotta Warriors.

Discover the traditions, imperial culture, and modernity that coexist in this vast country.

pack_italia.title: Treasures of Italy
pack_italia.descShort: Discover Rome, Florence, and Venice in an unforgettable trip
pack_italia.descLong:
Explore Italy’s most iconic cities: Rome with its ancient history, Florence and its Renaissance art, and Venice with its world-famous canals.

Enjoy authentic Italian pasta, visit world-renowned museums, and be amazed by classical architecture and European charm.

pack_francia.title: Romance in France
pack_francia.descShort: Explore Paris, the Loire Valley, and Provence
pack_francia.descLong:
Experience the magic of France starting in Paris, the city of love, and continuing through Renaissance castles and lavender fields in Provence.

Enjoy French cuisine, stroll along the Seine, and visit some of the world’s most important museums.

pack_kenia.title: Safari in Kenya
pack_kenia.descShort: Experience a real safari through Masai Mara and Nairobi
pack_kenia.descLong:
Immerse yourself in Africa’s wild nature. Watch lions, elephants, and giraffes roaming free across the Masai Mara plains.

Guided by local experts, enjoy lodge accommodations and a true introduction to African cultures.

pack_marruecos.title: Colors of Morocco
pack_marruecos.descShort: Discover Marrakech, the Sahara Desert, and Fez
pack_marruecos.descLong:
A journey filled with aromas, vibrant colors, and Arab architecture. Explore Marrakech’s souks, ride a camel through the Sahara Desert, and walk through the historic streets of Fez.

A perfect blend of tradition, exotic cuisine, and breathtaking landscapes.

pack_peru.title: Adventures in Peru
pack_peru.descShort: Explore Cusco, Machu Picchu, and Andean culture
pack_peru.descLong:
Travel to the heart of the Inca Empire, visit mystical Machu Picchu, and discover unique Andean landscapes.

Enjoy Peruvian cuisine, meet local communities, and live a cultural experience full of history.

pack_mexico.title: Essential Mexico
pack_mexico.descShort: Discover Mexico City, Cancun, and Chichén Itzá
pack_mexico.descLong:
A complete journey through Mexico: ancestral history, paradise beaches, and world-renowned cuisine.

Explore Mayan ruins, swim in crystal-clear cenotes, and enjoy the vibrancy of Mexican culture.
